goal.ch:
教授大學部機械系學生所需要，與機械工程專業課程相關的數學基礎，授課主題將分別應用於不同必/選修專業課程。
學期中若進行線上課程所用的Googl-Meet連結:
(Online course Google-Meet link if needed)
meet.google.com/agi-tjmr-ywa
goal.en:
This course provides a comprehensive and thorough mathematical backgrounds for the undergraduate students majoring in the mechanical engineering.
If any online course is delivered, please get into the link
meet.google.com/agi-tjmr-ywa

outline.ch:
(1) Briefing on Fourier Analysis (Week 1-2)
(2) Partial Differential Equations (Week 2-6; Week 6: 3/27週三 第1次期中考)
(3) Linear Algebra (Week 7-12; Week 12: 5/6週一or 5/8週三 第2次期中考)
(4) Vector Calculus (Week 13-18; Week 18: 6/17週一 期末考)
outline.en:
(1) Briefing on Fourier Analysis (Week 1-2)
(2) Partial Differential Equations (Week 2-6; Week 6: 3/27 Wed, 1st mid-term exam)
(3) Linear Algebra (Week 7-12; Week 12: 5/6 Mon or 5/8 Wed, 2nd mid-term exam)
(4) Vector Calculus (Week 13-18; Week 18: 6/17 Mon, final exam)

textbook.ch:
教科書-
Erwin Kreyszig, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics”
參考書-
1. Dennis Zill and Michael Cullen, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics”
2. Michael Greenburg, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics”
textbook.en:
Textbook-
Erwin Kreyszig, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics”
References-
1. Dennis Zill and Michael Cullen, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics”
2. Michael Greenburg, “Advanced Engineering Mathematics”

gradMethod.ch:
In-class 1st, 2nd midterm and final exams: 20, 30 and 30 ％ (the higher two scores take 30 ％)
Assignments: 20 ％
Class Participation: + ％ (extra)
gradMethod.en:
In-class 1st, 2nd midterm and final exams: 20, 30 and 30 ％ (the higher two scores take 30 ％)
Assignments: 20 ％
Class Participation: + ％ (extra)

en.competencies: Design / Development of Solution and Investigation

ch: 系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限二年級。學號:限單號。指定課程:必須先修ME2001。且檢定指定課程平均成績達40分以上。
系所:限機械工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。指定課程:必須先修ME2001。且檢定指定課程平均成績達40分以上。
系所:限工學院學士班。指定課程:必須先修ME2001。且檢定指定課程平均成績達40分以上。
en: Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:Second Year only.Student ID:odd numbers Only. Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementME2001 only.With an average of 40 or above for Required Subjects.

Department:Department of Mechanical Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementME2001 only.With an average of 40 or above for Required Subjects.
Department:Interdisciplinary Program of Engineering only.Specific Subject Requirements:Prerequisite Course RequirementME2001 only.With an average of 40 or above for Required Subjects.
